claim.long:
Lets you claim ~40 coins every hour to use in slime generation.

Cooldown: 1 hour

generate.long:
Creates a unique slime and replies to the user with it. This slime is now owned by the command user!

Cost: 10 coins
Cooldown: 15 seconds

view.long: Shows the slime corresponding to the given ID.

inventory.long:
Shows a navigatable embed of every slime the user owns ordered by date acquired. The filter must be 8 characters long. A '?' in the filter means anything can be in that slot.

Cooldown: 1 minute

trade.long:
Offers a trade for their slime given yours. If the receiver reacts with a checkmark the trade completes.

Cooldown: 1 minute

favorite.long:
Adds a given slime to your favorites list. Max of 9 slimes. Running this command on a slime you already have favorited will remove it from your favorites. If no id is provided your last generated slime will be used.

Cooldown: 5 seconds

favorites.long: Generates a collage of all your favorite slimes. Given the optional clear argument (either clear or c), your favorites will instead be reset.

give.short: [OWNER ONLY] Gifts a slime to a given user
give.long: Only the bots creator can use this command. This is not used to do a one-sided trade with someone.

rarity.short: Shows the rarity of a slime
rarity.long: Shows the rarity of the slime corresponding to the given ID.

rarities.long: Lists all the possible rarities a slime can generate as.

top.long:
Shows the given number of highest rarity slimes the user owns. If no number is provided, it will show the top 10.

Cooldown: 1 minute

sell.long:
Sells a given slime for an amount relating to its rarity.

Cooldown: 5 seconds

bulksell.short: Sells slimes in bulk given specific parameters
bulksell.long:
Given an optional parameter, sells some of your slimes in bulk.

Parameters:
last <x> - Sells x amount of your last obtained slimes
rarity <x> - Sells all slimes below the specified rarity
all - Sells all non-favorited slimes

Cooldown: 60 seconds

profile.long:
Shows the users profile, including basic information as well as random statistics.

Cooldown: 1 minute

reset.long:
WARNING: Only do this with 100% certainty. There are no reversals.

Wipes all your slimes from the server and resets your account.

Cooldown: 24 hours
